author: Cheryl Eddy
title: Apple TV+ Just Jacked Up Its Prices (Again)
description: You just dug deeper into your wallet for Netflix—so perhaps it’s no surprise that Apple TV+ is now demanding the same. Almost a year to the day after its first price hike since its 2019 launch, Apple TV+ is increasing from $6.99 to $9.99 monthly; annual plans…
